O1.summary: Hunt Down and Kill Captain McRedd

description.S1: Based on the bounty listing, Captain McRedd was last sighted in the Back Bays.
description.S2: Head there and take him out.

blurb.B1: You can find Captain MacRedd in the Back Bays area of the Groundbreaker.
blurb.B2: To get there head down the elevator in the promenade,
blurb.B4: You can pass a Persuade (40) check to get him to put his gun down,
blurb.B5: otherwise you'll have to kill him and all his guards.
blurb.B6: If you kill him he drops the Unique Weapon: Montag.
blurb.B8: If you persuaded him, use Perception to note it says "Sanita" on the lighter.
blurb.B9: MacRedd will mention it was given to him by Sanita in remembrance of a 'carnal understanding' they had a few years back.

O2.summary: Claim the Bounty's Reward from Comdt. Sanita

description.S1: McRedd gave you his lucky lighter to give to Sanita.
description.S2: Go turn it in to resolve his bounty.

blurb.B1: Turn the lighter in to Commandant Sanita to claim the bounty.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Look at this ripe piece of meat just sizzling on the grill. Yum yum.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Time to feed the flames. It's nothing personal. Promise.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Put that down before you incinerate the entire deck.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're only getting out of this alive if you play nice.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I was just exploring the ship and stumbled on this level.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: If it's nothing personal, I'll just be going.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> Neither is this.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: I know this ain't a toy, neighbor from above. It's a catalyst, just like me. Keep talking. I like the sound of your voice.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There's a bounty on your head. I want to claim the reward.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm just passing through. Can I go?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> I was just distracting you. Nothing personal.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Listen to the fire of those convictions. This one's hungry for justice.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Alive or dead. Rare or medium. What's it gonna be? How do you want me cooked, bounty hunter?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No need for violence. Give me your lighter and the bounty disappears.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> Medium well.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Er... I forget, let me go check. I'll be right back!

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: My flame? Shit. Little Flick here got me started on the pyro path. Fine, he's yours. Give him a good home.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Wait, the engraving on here... does this say 'Sanita' on it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There was something else.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> You're still a dead man.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Be seeing you.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Keen eyes you got there. Sanita gave me this lighter. We had a carnal understanding a few years back, and she wanted me to have something to remember her by.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Lay it on me, boss. I'm good for it.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Neighbor from above. What brings you to my little moonlight kingdom?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: How did you end up back here?

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Ship got impounded. The crew and I racked up a debt while we were grounded, and my baby got sold to SubLight. Scrapped for parts.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: That's bureaucracy for you. Piracy with a smile.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: That's bureaucracy for you. Piracy with a smile.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sounds a lot like what happened to me.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Am I your dark reflection? Shit. Must be getting old. Stay here too long and the Groundbreaker drains you like a fuel tank.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Passing through? This is dead end territory. But you talk like you're on a journey. The path matches your step. Stretches out ahead of you. Yeah...

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: Look at the courage on this one! Lay it on me, boss. Give me a taste of that fiery, primal spirit.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: You stumbled into my court without an invitation, neighbor from above. If you don't have any business, then it's time to light up the grill.

dialog.speaker: CaptainMacRedd (Male)
dialog.utterance: No one turns their back on me while I'm holding court. Get him, boys!
